title: Sweet potato and lentil cottage pie

ingredients.item: 400g pack Aberdeen Angus 5% fat beef mince

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large pan and cook the onion, carrots and beef for 5 minutes. Add the rosemary, tomatoes, lentils, stock and paste. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the sweet potatoes in a pan of water for 15 minutes until tender. Drain well. Using a stick blender, whizz until smooth, then stir in the chives.
Preheat the oven to 200˚C, gas mark 6. Stir the peas into the fi lling, then transfer to a heatproof dish. Spoon over the mash. Bake for 20-25 minutes until the top is crusty and golden.
